mapper.select: SELECT DOMAIN_PART_CODE, DOMAIN_ADDRESS, DOMAIN_PART FROM DOMAIN_PART ORDER BY DOMAIN_PART_CODE
SELECT POSITION_PART_CODE, POSITION_PART FROM POSITION_PART ORDER BY POSITION_PART_CODE
SELECT REGION_PART_CODE, REGION_PART FROM REGION_PART ORDER BY REGION_PART_CODE
SELECT TIME_PART_CODE, TIME_PART FROM TIME_PART ORDER BY TIME_PART_CODE
SELECT SUBJECT_PART_CODE, SUBJECT_PART FROM SUBJECT_PART ORDER BY SUBJECT_PART_CODE
SELECT SKILL_PART_CODE, SKILL_PART FROM SKILL_PART ORDER BY SKILL_PART_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM U WHERE USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND U_PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{pw}, #{pw})

SELECT U.U_ID AS id, U.U_NAME AS name, U.U_NICKNAME, U.U_EMAIL AS email , U.U_TEL, U.POSITION_PART_CODE, U.REGION_PART_CODE, U.TIME_PART_CODE , U.SUBJECT_PART_CODE, U.U_INTRO, U.U_PORTFOLIO_URL , US.SKILL_PART_CODE AS skill_part_code, U.DOMAIN_PART_CODE FROM U, U_SKILL US WHERE U.USER_CODE = US.USER_CODE AND U_SKILL_PART_CODE = 'USPT000001' AND U.USER_CODE = #{user_code}

SELECT LISTAGG(SKILL_PART_CODE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_PART_CODE) AS skill_part_code4 FROM SKILL_PART_CODE_VIEW WHERE U_SKILL_PART_CODE IN ('USPT000001', 'USPT000002') AND U_SKILL_PART_CODE = 'USPT000002' AND USER_CODE = #{user_code} GROUP BY U_SKILL_PART_CODE

SELECT T1.P_NAME, T1.USER_CODE, TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_END_DATE, T1.P_CODE, T3.U_P_APPLY_CODE, ROUND(NVL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK_COMPLETE WHERE PH_SUBWORK_CODE IN ( SELECT PH_SUBWORK_CODE FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE U_P_APPLY_CODE IN ( SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_POSITION A1, U_P_APPLY A2 WHERE P_CODE = ( SELECT I3.P_CODE FROM U_P_APPLY I1, P_POSITION I2, P I3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM I4 WHERE I1.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND I1.P_POSITION_CODE = I2.P_POSITION_CODE AND I2.P_CODE = I3.P_CODE AND I3.P_CODE = I4.P_CODE AND I4.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE NOT IN (SELECT P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE FROM P_END) ) AND A1.P_POSITION_CODE = A2.P_POSITION_CODE AND U_P_APPLY_CODE NOT IN (SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_REJECT) ) ) )/DECODE( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE U_P_APPLY_CODE IN ( SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_POSITION A1, U_P_APPLY A2 WHERE P_CODE = ( SELECT I3.P_CODE FROM U_P_APPLY I1, P_POSITION I2, P I3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM I4 WHERE I1.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND I1.P_POSITION_CODE = I2.P_POSITION_CODE AND I2.P_CODE = I3.P_CODE AND I3.P_CODE = I4.P_CODE AND I4.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE NOT IN (SELECT P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE FROM P_END) ) AND A1.P_POSITION_CODE = A2.P_POSITION_CODE AND U_P_APPLY_CODE NOT IN (SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_REJECT) ) ) ,0, NULL, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PH_SUBWORK WHERE U_P_APPLY_CODE IN ( SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_POSITION A1, U_P_APPLY A2 WHERE P_CODE = ( SELECT I3.P_CODE FROM U_P_APPLY I1, P_POSITION I2, P I3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM I4 WHERE I1.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND I1.P_POSITION_CODE = I2.P_POSITION_CODE AND I2.P_CODE = I3.P_CODE AND I3.P_CODE = I4.P_CODE AND I4.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE NOT IN (SELECT P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE FROM P_END) ) AND A1.P_POSITION_CODE = A2.P_POSITION_CODE AND U_P_APPLY_CODE NOT IN (SELECT U_P_APPLY_CODE FROM P_REJECT) ) ) ), 0)*100, 0) AS ALL_PERCENT , T5.SKILL_PART FROM P T1, P_POSITION T2, U_P_APPLY T3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM T4, SKILL_PART T5 WHERE T1.P_CODE = T2.P_CODE AND T2.P_POSITION_CODE = T3.P_POSITION_CODE AND T2.P_CODE = T4.P_CODE AND T3.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND T4.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE FROM P_END) AND T1.SKILL_PART_CODE = T5.SKILL_PART_CODE

SELECT T1.P_NAME , T1.USER_CODE , T3.USER_CODE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_END_DATE , T1.P_CODE , T3.U_P_APPLY_CODE , T4.SKILL_PART FROM P T1, P_POSITION T2, U_P_APPLY T3, SKILL_PART T4 WHERE T1.P_CODE = T2.P_CODE AND T2.P_POSITION_CODE = T3.P_POSITION_CODE AND T1.P_CODE NOT IN (SELECT P_CODE FROM P_FAILED) AND T3.USER_CODE NOT IN (SELECT USER_CODE FROM P) AND T1.SKILL_PART_CODE = T4.SKILL_PART_CODE AND T3.USER_CODE = #{user_code}

SELECT T1.P_NAME , T1.USER_CODE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_END_DATE , T1.P_CODE , T3.U_P_APPLY_CODE , T5.P_END_CONDITION_CODE , T6.SKILL_PART FROM P T1, P_POSITION T2, U_P_APPLY T3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM T4, P_END T5, SKILL_PART T6 WHERE T1.P_CODE = T2.P_CODE AND T2.P_POSITION_CODE = T3.P_POSITION_CODE AND T1.SKILL_PART_CODE = T6.SKILL_PART_CODE AND T3.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND T4.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE = T5.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE

SELECT T1.P_NAME , T1.USER_CODE , T3.USER_CODE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(T1.PJ_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_END_DATE , T1.P_CODE , T3.U_P_APPLY_CODE , T5.SKILL_PART FROM P T1, P_POSITION T2, U_P_APPLY T3, P_TEAM_CONFIRM T4, SKILL_PART T5 WHERE T1.P_CODE = T2.P_CODE AND T2.P_POSITION_CODE = T3.P_POSITION_CODE AND T1.P_CODE = T4.P_CODE AND T1.USER_CODE = T3.USER_CODE AND T1.SKILL_PART_CODE = T5.SKILL_PART_CODE AND T3.USER_CODE = #{user_code}
